Summary: Crunchy yet tender this Air Fryer Roasted Garlic Broccoli is going to become a favorite side dish. Super quick and easy this is the best way to cook broccoli guaranteed!
Instructions: In a medium sized bowl add the broccoli, olive oil, garlic, italian seasoning and salt and pepper. Toss to coat evenly.
Add the broccoli to your air fryer basket.  Cook at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until tender.
Comments: Kathy Beiermann says:Very tasty, easy to cook in air fryer. Anyone dieting should try this!!
